title: 305. Andy & DJ CTI: Twitter Resisting Musk's Right To Information, Dallas 'Drag Your Kids To Pride' Sparks Outrage & CDC Raises Monkeypox Alert
itunes:title: 305. Andy & DJ CTI: Twitter Resisting Musk's Right To Information, Dallas 'Drag Your Kids To Pride' Sparks Outrage & CDC Raises Monkeypox Alert
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Elon Musk stating that Twitter is actively resisting and thwarting his right to information on spam & fake account data, video surfacing of a Dallas drag show showing children handing money to the performers, and the CDC raising its monkeypox alert recommending masks during travel.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Elon Musk stating that Twitter is actively resisting and thwarting his right to information on spam & fake account data, video surfacing of a Dallas drag show showing children handing money to the performers, and the CDC raising its monkeypox alert recommending masks during travel.
